definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Eutectic composition should be adopted for high-Cr white cast iron used under high-stress impact abrasion condition.
sentences.chinese: 高應力衝擊磨料磨損時，高鉻白口鑄鐵應選共晶成分。

sentences.english: The garnet mineral is regarded as a well- performed natural grinding material.
sentences.chinese: 石榴石礦物是性能優良的天然磨料。

sentences.english: In this paper a new kind of superhard abrasive with corundum-coating was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種新型的剛玉塗覆的超硬磨料。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 剷鬥切削刀刃爲抗磨料磨損鋼材，布氏硬度達500。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to an abrasive-recovery mechanism in a blasting machine.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及拋丸機中的磨料回收機構。

sentences.english: Study on Impact Wear Properties of Composite Layer with Tungsten and Chromium;
sentences.chinese: 高應力衝擊磨料磨損時，高鉻白口鑄鐵應選共晶成分。

sentences.english: Corundum abrasive with bauxite as the main raw material formed at high temperature melting.
sentences.chinese: 棕剛玉磨料以鋁礬土爲主要原料經高溫熔鍊而成。

sentences.english: The impact force and pressure are described about the pre-mixed abrasive waterjet.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了前混合磨料清砂的衝擊力和衝擊壓強。

sentences.english: Abrasive Waterjet(AWJ)polishing process is a recently developed precision machining technology.
sentences.chinese: 磨料水射流拋光是新出現的一種精密加工技術。

sentences.english: The polishing performance of quartz and KDP with Abrasive Airjet Machining is studied by experiments.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磨料氣射流拋光石英和KDP材料時的性能。

sentences.english: Do not use any kind of abrasive that might scratch the gold.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用任何一種可能抓傷磨料黃金。

sentences.english: A trademark used for an abrasive of silicon carbide crystals.
sentences.chinese: 金剛砂一種碳化硅晶體磨料的商標名。

sentences.english: Superhard materials as abrasive and tool materials developed quickly.
sentences.chinese: 超硬材料作爲磨料和刀具材料發展得很快。

sentences.english: The presence of striation area is one of the main characteristic on the surface generated by abrasive jet.
sentences.chinese: 波紋區域的存在是磨料射流切割表面的主要特徵之一。

sentences.english: Polishing technique of abrasive water jet(AWJ) is an advance process which can be applied to surface polishing.
sentences.chinese: 磨料水射流拋光技術是應用於表面拋光加工的新技術。

sentences.english: Theresult proved, abrasive water jet metal-cutting don't exit heat effect.
sentences.chinese: 試驗結果表明，磨料水射流切割無熱影響區。
